data.lyric:
[ti:Livin’ The Dream (Explicit)]
[ar:Morgan Wallen]
[al:Livin’ The Dream (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Livin’ The Dream (Explicit) - Morgan Wallen
[00:03.55]Lyrics by：Morgan Wallen/Jacob Durrett/Ben Burgess/Michael Hardy
[00:07.10]Composed by：Morgan Wallen/Jacob Durrett/Ben Burgess/Michael Hardy
[00:10.65]Mama don't pray for my success anymore yeah
[00:14.29]But mama still prays for me
[00:18.23]Seein' the world ain't really seein' the world
[00:21.50]Through a window from A to B
[00:25.43]Between alcohol and women and Adderall and adrenaline
[00:29.69]I don't ever get no rest
[00:33.21]Sign my life away to be the life of the party
[00:37.12]Yeah to everybody else
[00:40.07]I look like a rockstar in and out of cop cars
[00:43.87]Livin' out a suitcase trashin' hotel bars
[00:47.68]If I see the sunrise it's 'cause I stayed up all night
[00:51.43]Drinkin' 'cause I need to d**n it what a good life
[00:55.23]Judgin' by my long hair you might think I don't care
[00:58.99]Sittin' here sippin' and b***hin' about a spot where
[01:02.69]People would kill to be kill to be kill to be
[01:06.31]But y'all it ain't as good as it seems this livin' the dream is
[01:11.21]Killin' me killin' me killin' me
[01:14.77]It's killin' me killin' me killin' me
[01:18.26]Another day another venue
[01:20.17]There's trouble to get into
[01:22.12]And love ain't on the menu again
[01:26.18]Lonely as an eagle
[01:27.81]I meet a thousand people
[01:29.62]Who think I got a thousand friends
[01:33.85]Ooh
[01:38.73]There's a stranger in the mirror
[01:41.42]Ooh
[01:46.26]But accordin' to the pictures
[01:48.96]I'm a rockstar in and out of cop cars
[01:51.77]Livin' out a suitcase trashin' hotel bars
[01:55.71]If I see the sunrise it's 'cause I stayed up all night
[01:59.42]Drinkin' 'cause I need to d**n it what a good life
[02:03.15]Judgin' by my long hair you might think I don't care
[02:06.92]Sittin' here sippin' and b***hin' about a spot where
[02:10.80]People would kill to be kill to be kill to be
[02:14.24]But y'all it ain't as good as it seems this livin' the dream is
[02:19.29]Killin' me killin' me killin' me
[02:22.84]It's killin' me killin' me killin' me
[02:26.75]Killin' me killin' me killin' me
[02:34.34]Ooh
[02:39.15]There's a stranger in the mirror
[02:41.91]Ooh
[02:46.72]But accordin' to the pictures
[02:49.00]I'm a rockstar in and out of cop cars
[02:52.24]Livin' out a suitcase trashin' hotel bars
[02:56.00]If I see the sunrise it's 'cause I stayed up all night
[02:59.84]Drinkin' 'cause I need to d**n it what a good life
[03:03.62]Judgin' by my long hair you might think I don't care
[03:07.36]Sittin' here sippin' and b***hin' about a spot where
[03:11.16]People would kill to be kill to be kill to be
[03:14.80]But y'all it ain't as good as it seems this livin' the dream is
[03:19.69]Killin' me killin' me killin' me
[03:23.19]It's killin' me killin' me killin' me
[03:27.18]Killin' me killin' me killin' me
data.trans:
[ti:Livin’ The Dream (Explicit)]
[ar:Morgan Wallen]
[al:Livin’ The Dream (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:03.55]//
[00:07.10]//
[00:10.65]妈妈 别再祈祷我成功
[00:14.29]但妈妈依然为我祈祷
[00:18.23]看了这大千世界 并没有真的让我学会什么
[00:21.50]透过那一扇窗 心情也不同以往
[00:25.43]沉溺于灯红酒绿 花花世界
[00:29.69]我从来没有休息过
[00:33.21]我的生活被各种派对占据
[00:37.12]对别人来说
[00:40.07]我像个摇滚明星 经常坐在警车里
[00:43.87]漂泊四海 在酒店酒吧里饮酒
[00:47.68]如果我看到日出 那是因为我整夜没睡
[00:51.43]喝酒是因为我没办法 多好的生活啊
[00:55.23]从我的飘飘长发来看 你可能以为我不在乎
[00:58.99]坐在这里 一边喝酒 一边抱怨 在那个地方
[01:02.69]人们为了自己存活 愿意牺牲别人
[01:06.31]但是各位 这没有表面上那样美好 实现梦想这种事
[01:11.21]让我痛不欲生
[01:14.77]我因此痛不欲生
[01:18.26]另一个时间 另一个地点
[01:20.17]又遇到麻烦
[01:22.12]依然没有爱
[01:26.18]像一只鹰一样孤独
[01:27.81]我遇见了一千个人
[01:29.62]都认为我有一千个朋友
[01:33.85]//
[01:38.73]镜子里的我 好陌生
[01:41.42]//
[01:46.26]但是从照片上看
[01:48.96]我是个摇滚明星 经常坐在警车里
[01:51.77]漂泊四海 在酒店酒吧里饮酒
[01:55.71]如果我看到日出 那是因为我整夜没睡
[01:59.42]喝酒是因为我没办法 多好的生活啊
[02:03.15]从我的飘飘长发来看 你可能以为我不在乎
[02:06.92]坐在这里 一边喝酒 一边抱怨 在那个地方
[02:10.80]人们为了自己存活 愿意牺牲别人
[02:14.24]但是各位 这没有表面上那样美好 实现梦想这种事
[02:19.29]让我痛不欲生
[02:22.84]我因此痛不欲生
[02:26.75]让我痛不欲生
[02:34.34]//
[02:39.15]镜子里的我 好陌生
[02:41.91]//
[02:46.72]但是从照片上看
[02:49.00]我是个摇滚明星 经常坐在警车里
[02:52.24]漂泊四海 在酒店酒吧里饮酒
[02:56.00]如果我看到日出 那是因为我整夜没睡
[02:59.84]喝酒是因为我没办法 多好的生活啊
[03:03.62]从我的飘飘长发来看 你可能以为我不在乎
[03:07.36]坐在这里 一边喝酒 一边抱怨 在那个地方

[03:19.69]让我痛不欲生

[03:27.18]让我痛不欲生
